description: Try our easy to follow Avocado And Thai Beef Salad Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Thai beef salad,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Tomato,Avocado,Sesame free,Beef,Dairy free
name: Avocado And Thai Beef Salad Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 avocado, peeled, pitted, cut into 2cm cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Place vermicelli noodles in a bowl, pour over boiling water and allow to sit for 3 minutes. Drain and refresh in cold water. Set aside.
To make the dressing, place fish sauce, brown sugar, lime juice and garlic in a small bowl and stir to dissolve sugar. Set aside.
Preheat oil in a medium frying pan over high heat. Season steak with salt and cook for 3 minutes, then flip and cook for a further 3 minutes. Set aside to rest uncovered for 5 minutes.
Thinly slice steak. Combine with noodles and remaining salad ingredients in a large bowl and toss to combine.
Transfer to serving plates and drizzle with dressing to serve.
